attributes.action: To Reinstate      Nurse Margaret Haywood and to hold a review into all care for      the elderly and vuleranable.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to To Reinstate and compensate
     Nurse Margaret Haywood and to hold an all party review into all care for
     the elderly and vulnerable in the UK.

     Nurse Margaret Haywood took part (bravely)in a documentary for Panorama
     to show how the elderly and vulnerable are badly looked after in
     the Royal Sussex Hospital. I am petitioning for the
     reinstatement of Nurse Haywood and for the government to 
     commission an inquiry to ensure that the old and vulnerable 
     are looked after with dignity and sensitivity.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
